basics.name: servicePrincipalObjectId
basics.label: Blast Service Principal Object ID
basics.toolTip: Find in: Azure Portal > Entra ID > Enterprise Applications > search 'blast-activity-collector' > copy the Object ID (not the Application ID).

options.text: These roles are optional. Enable them to grant Blast access to specific monitoring and data resources in this subscription.

elements.name: enableMonitoringReader
elements.label: Monitoring Reader (subscription scope)
elements.toolTip: Grants Monitoring Reader across the entire subscription — provides read access to monitoring metrics and activity logs.

elements.name: storageAccount
elements.label: Storage Account — Storage Blob Data Reader
elements.toolTip: Optionally grant Storage Blob Data Reader on a specific storage account. Leave blank to skip.

elements.name: eventHubNamespace
elements.label: Event Hub Namespace — Azure Event Hubs Data Receiver
elements.toolTip: Optionally grant Azure Event Hubs Data Receiver on a specific Event Hub namespace. Leave blank to skip.

elements.name: logAnalyticsWorkspace
elements.label: Log Analytics Workspace — Log Analytics Reader
elements.toolTip: Optionally grant Log Analytics Reader on a specific Log Analytics workspace. Leave blank to skip.
